publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3867.1 Linda Fabiani: The Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3867) in the name of Pauline McNeill, leave out from "follows" to end and insert ", supported by resources from the Scottish Government, follows eight years of inaction by the Labour/Liberal Democrat coalition; congratulates the academy for its long fight to maintain its status as Scotland’s internationally renowned conservatoire of music and drama, and considers that this announcement places that status on a sustainable basis for the first time."

S3M-3867.1 The Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 7 April 2009) Michael Matheson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Maureen Watt*, Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*, Brian Adam*
S3M-3867.1 The Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 7 April 2009) Aileen Campbell*, Ian McKee*
S3M-3867.1 The Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 7 April 2009) Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3867.1 The Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 7 April 2009) Willie Coffey* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
